trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_SEQ_00<tab>Alisaie is nodding approvingly at the sutlers.
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Conrad.
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>Hardly surprising. Where there is war, there is profit to be had.
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_LYSE_100_015<tab>If you need to buy anything, now might be a good time.
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_ALISAIE_000_020<tab>Come to take the measure of our friendly neighborhood merchants?

TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_ALISAIE_000_021<tab>They're a bold lot, that much is plain. If the imperials found out they were peddling their wares to the Resistance, they would be lucky to escape with their lives.
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_ALPHINAUD_000_022<tab>'Tis a gamble, aye, and I admire their courage. But their motives could hardly be said to be altruistic...
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_MNAAGO_000_023<tab>Ah, here you are. I've been looking all over for you.
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_MNAAGO_100_023<tab>We've finished discussing your proposal, and we're ready to receive you all back at the tent.
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_MNAAGO_000_024<tab>I've sent someone to fetch Y'shtola and Krile, so if you'd like to follow me...
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_MNAAGO_000_030<tab>We'll begin once the others arrive.
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_MEFFRID_000_035<tab>Sorry to have kept you waiting, but matters such as these demand due deliberation.
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_LYSE_000_040<tab>What a relief! For a moment there, I really wasn't sure which way it was going to go...
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_YSHTOLA_000_045<tab>Krile and I shall remain here for now. Should you have need of us, you are welcome to visit.

TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_KRILE_000_050<tab>I briefly dabbled with similar methods involving distillations and infusions of herbal extracts, but I must confess to knowing little and less of Ala Mhigan traditional medicine. Would that I knew more, for its effectiveness exceeds all expectations...
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_CONRAD_000_055<tab>Now that we've dealt with the formalities, we can get to work. I'm glad you're with us, friend.
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_MNAAGO_000_060<tab>Heh! As if there were any doubt!
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_MEFFRID_000_065<tab>Pinch me if I'm dreaming, because I'd swear it's finally happening. The whole of Eorzea, committed at last to the liberation of Ala Mhigo!
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_ALISAIE_000_070<tab>Right, then. M'naago and Meffrid are to be our keepers.
TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_ALISAIE_000_071<tab>Knowing naught of what they require, one task is as good as the other. Make your choice, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

TEXT_STMBDA105_02450_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>Your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>aether compass<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> may now be used to locate aether currents in new regions! The aether compass can be found under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.
